title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 820 - Safe Operations of Commercial Motor Vehicles by Motor Carriers and Drivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 820 - Safe Operations of Commercial Motor Vehicles by Motor Carriers and Drivers

State Regulations
§ 820.0 - Applicability
§ 820.1 - General applicability and definitions
§ 820.2 - Commercial driver's license standards and controlled substances and alcohol use and testing
§ 820.3 - Qualifications of drivers
§ 820.4 - Driving of commercial motor vehicles
§ 820.5 - Parts and accessories necessary for safe operation
§ 820.6 - Hours of service of drivers
§ 820.7 - Inspection, repair and maintenance
§ 820.8 - Transportation of hazardous materials
§ 820.9 - Investigation of motor carrier files
§ 820.10 - Penalties and remedies
§ 820.11 - Exemptions
§ 820.12 - Inspection of motor vehicles in operation
§ 820.13 - Incorporation by reference
§ 820.14 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 820

Statutory authority: Transportation Law, §§14, 14-f, 138, 140, 143, 145; 211, 212[a];Vehicle and Traffic Law, art. 19-B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
